description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission PP/2015/3143 dated 28/10/2016 for Redevelopment of the site to provide a two storey building for use as a restaurant (Use Class A) with associated drive through; provision of vehicle access from Western Avenue; and egress from Leamington Park; car parking and landscaping including outdoor seating area; installation of 2No. of customer displays (openings), canopy and refuse storage. Amendment involving alteration to the location of the charging parking bays, alteration to the cycle stands on the eastern boundary, insertion of cycle lockers, external modifications to all elevations, alteration to include the corral in the northern elevation, alterations to the ground and first floor layouts, alteration to the roof plant and photovoltaic layout.
